title: Can't print attachement in PDF
content:
When I receive an pdf attachment in an email and select print, I get an empty page. This is happen, I think, since the last update.

OS Windows 11 Version of Thunderbird 137.0.1, it was automatically updated Printer: Brother MFC L27130W and it works for all other programs
creator: pluesswh

title: Forwarding Phishing Emails Prevented
content: I routinely forward phishing emails to report@phishing.gov.uk, and then refile them as spam, but lately TB for Android has held them in the Outbox. I get a notification "unable to send for policy reason". Is there a solution?
creator: Rich57
